org.jpaste.pastebin.account

Class PastebinAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpaste.pastebin.account.PastebinAccount

  • public class PastebinAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an account on Pastebin.

    This class can fetch a non-expiring user session id. This session id is used for generating private pasted, fetching user details, fetching user his pastes, adding pastes to his account & more account based interactions.

    A reference manual for generating a user session id can be found here.

    Author:
    Brian B

    • Constructor Detail

      • PastebinAccount

        public PastebinAccount()
        Creates a new empty PastebinAccount instance.

      • PastebinAccount

        public PastebinAccount(java.lang.String developerKey,
               java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new PastebinAccount instance. When you use this constructor, you'll need to use the login() to fetch an user session id
        Parameters:
        developerKey - a developer key which can be fetched from the pastebin API page
        username - the username of the pastebin account
        password - the password of the pastebin account

      • PastebinAccount

        public PastebinAccount(java.lang.String userSessionId)
        Creates a new PastebinAccount instance.
        Parameters:
        userSessionId - the user session id of the pastebin account.

      • PastebinAccount

        public PastebinAccount(java.lang.String developerKey,
               java.lang.String userSessionId)
        Creates a new PastebinAccount instance.
        Parameters:
        developerKey - a developer key which can be fetched from the pastebin API page
        userSessionId - the user session id of the pastebin account.

        public void setUserSessionId(java.lang.String userSessionId)
        Sets the user session id The user session id can be used to paste private pastes and will add pastes to your account
        Parameters:
        userSessionId - the user session id of the pastebin account

           throws LoginException

      • getPastes

        public PastebinLink[] getPastes(int limit)
                         throws ParseException
        Gets all pasted pastes by this user
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum amount of pastes to receive

        0 > limit > 1000

        Returns:
        all pasted pastes made by this user/account
        Throws:
        ParseException - if it failed to parse the pastes

      • getPastes

        public PastebinLink[] getPastes()
                         throws ParseException
        Gets pasted pastes (max 50) by this user
        Returns:
        all pasted pastes made by this user/account
        Throws:
        ParseException - if it failed to parse the pastes
